::Prowl::

Prowl nods, walking into the control room. He tilts his head in 
greeting toward Epyon, and then walks up to Iron Raptor, saluting.

"Commander, this is Firedrill. I picked him and two other bots up 
from a crash site." he says outloud, while his thoughts convey a 
slightly different message to Iron Raptor alone: -He seems kinda 
familiar to me, love, but I can't place my finger on it. Maybe its 
nothing. I have a feeling we can trust him though.-

Prowl motions for Firedrill to step forward, taking a step off toward 
Epyon. He needed to speak to him about the city idea.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> "But the strategies are important to any battle, to keep the troops
> together," Firdrill exclaims. He then thinks about Prowl's words 
about
> needed warriors. He was not anxious to hear that. He didn't train 
for ten
> years, just to learn how to aim a gun and take life, he trained to 
save it.
> He followed on in silent, contemplating.
